jobDescription: Category : Long Term Care - SNF  Location/City : CA - San Francisco  Job Type : PermanentClinical Resources is currently seeking well-qualifiedLong Term Care Professionals Nationwide!Long Term Care Opportunities: Nursing Home Administrator  Director of Nursing  Assistant Director of Nursing  MDS Coordinator  Staff Nurse  Regional Nurse  Clinical Reimbursement  Social Worker  And several additional LTC positions! We offer Permanent and Interim positions, so if you are looking for a change in scenery, travel, new opportunity, or just a new experience - come join our team!In addition, if you know of someone who is also searching for a new Healthcare Career - please let us know and we would welcome the opportunity to discuss our generous Referral Program. Please join our Talent Network by clicking the link below, or submit your resume to Susan@Clinicalresources.com to stay connected to current and future LTC opportunities in your area! *No Calls or Faxes Please***Please Note: You may not receive an immediate response. Once you have submitted your resume, our Recruitment Specialists and Staffing Coordinators will review it to will determine if you may potentially be a fit for one of our open positions. Should they determine that you are indeed a fit, then they will contact you! In the meantime, your resume will be added to our database, and once an opportunity becomes available that matches what you are looking for, we will reach out to you at that time!** #1CR
